blogPost.excerpt: An estimate 60% of small businesses closed down due to covid. Now more than ever they need your help. I created some tools and training to teach you how to build a local lead generation business to help out these businesses.
blogPost.body: An estimate 60% of small businesses closed down due to covid. Now more than ever they need your help. I created some tools and training to teach you how to build a local lead generation business to help out these businesses.
blogPost.title: Local Lead Game - Learn the local lead generation game & help local businesses
blogPost.author: Ken Savage

localize.description: 据估计，60%的小企业因为covid而倒闭。现在他们比以往任何时候都更需要你的帮助。我创建了一些工具和培训，教你如何建立一个本地的线索生成业务，以帮助这些企业。
localize.tagline: 学习当地的潜在客户开发游戏，并帮助当地的企业

localize.description: 據估計，60%的小企業因爲covid而倒閉。現在他們比以往任何時候都更需要你的幫助。我創建了一些工具和培訓，教你如何建立一個本地的線索生成業務，以幫助這些企業。
localize.tagline: 學習當地的潛在客戶開發遊戲，並幫助當地的企業

previous.excerpt: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
previous.title: Directual - Power of Coding in No-code format

localize.description: Directual是唯一的无代码平台，它结合了传统编码的灵活性、可扩展性和安全性，以及现代的可视化开发方法。您可以使用Directual构建可扩展、安全和复杂的应用程序。
Directual是唯一的無代碼平臺，它結合了傳統編碼的靈活性、可擴展性和安全性，以及現代的可視化開發方法。您可以使用Directual構建可擴展、安全和複雜的應用程序。

next.title: With 87% of companies reported, Q4 S&P 500 GAAP earnings were down 20% over the prior year. $SPX https://t.co/CyvUdWFwvZ

localize.full_text: 87%的公司发布了报告，第四季度S&P 500的GAAP收益比上年下降了20%。$SPX https://t.co/CyvUdWFwvZ
